nodes.text: A Human male served as a soldier in the Mantellian Army of the planet Ord Mantell during the Separatist War between the Galactic Republic–backed Ord Mantell Central Authority and the Mantellian Separatist Movement. In the year 3643 BBY, the Mantellian Trooper participated in the Republic's blockade of Talloran village, intended to contain the Separatist forces that had seized control of the settlement. While waiting, he scolded a comrade who complained about how little the soldiers were doing.

The Human soldier had green eyes, tan skin, and wore the blue uniform commonly used by personnel of the Mantellian Army, with a blaster rifle strapped to his back. He did not mind the waiting during the blockade, and chided another soldier who did.
The soldier appears in the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, developed by BioWare. In the game, the soldier is identified as "Dutiful Soldier."
